== StartUbuntu Members ==

Members of this project will be named: '''StartUbuntu Ambassadors''' :D

To be become a member, please, sign up with your Wiki Page or Launchpad ID here :)

* If you don't know how to create a Wiki Page and need help, please see <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/GettingInvolved#How_to_Join.3F | this guide]]</nowiki>.

== HOWTO Edit a Wiki Page ==

* First thing first, you need a Launchpad Account - See this
* You then need to use your Login Details to login as shown below:

<nowiki>[[File:UbuntuGNOME/Meetings/Agenda/step1.png]]</nowiki>

* Once you login, please refresh your browser, copy this link '''https://wiki.ubuntu.com/StartUbuntu/WhoAreWe''', paste it on your address bar of whatever browser you are using and then press Enter OR just click on the link :)

<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:UbuntuGNOME/Meetings/Agenda/step2.png]]</nowiki>
